entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers beginning this morning then changing to flurries near noon and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 then northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023
